name: CGConfigureOption
desc: The scope of the changes in a display configuration transaction.

items.name: static var forAppOnly: CGConfigureOption
items.desc: Changes persist for the lifetime of the current application. After the application terminates, the display configuration settings revert to the current login session.

items.name: static var forSession: CGConfigureOption
items.desc: Changes persist for the lifetime of the current login session. After the current session terminates, the displays revert to the last saved permanent configuration.
